name: Kalvgv's Descent into the Pith
description:
You play as Kalvgv the Mandrake Cleric, faced against demons and the undead.

Contolrs are 1-5 as inventory hotkeys

wasd movement, space attack, m map, shift stealth q and e are straf 

made in GMS1.4x

Game is now in Beta

Going to make it a roguelike later
